T.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1 or ( externalsystemid >75 and etl_time > '2016-12-14')

F.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 'f' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1 or ( externalsystemid >75 and etl_time > '2016-12-14')
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1 or ( externalsystemid >85 and etl_time > '2016-12-14')
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  ( questionposition = 1 and questioncode >'7')or ( externalsystemid >75 and etl_time > '2016-12-14')
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  surveyid = 1 or ( externalsystemid >75 and etl_time > '2016-12-14')
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 1 or ( externalsystemid >75 )
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 'f' and questioncode >'7') or  questionposition = 2 or ( externalsystemid >75 and etl_time > '2016-12-28')
